Package ray.rage.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Game
    A game is the basic interface clients implement to have access to the framework and its functionality.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGame
    An abstract class with convenience protected methods to provide a basic logical structure to the steps needed for a game to set itself up, run, and clean up after itself.
    BaseGame
    The base game provides a base implementation for the mayority of a game's behavior during setup, teardown, and the proper sequence to follow.
    VariableFrameRateGame
    This class implements a tight game loop that runs as fast as it can, rather than running at a pre-set maximum number of frames per interval step.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Game.State
    The state is used to inform and determine some aspects of a game's behavior.
